item.title: KDE 4, open terminal here
item.description: When I was using KDE 3 I was pretty fond of the right click Open Terminal Here command. I was disapointed to see it gone in the latest incarnations of KDE . Until I stumbled upon dolphin’s integrated terminal. All you have to do is hit F4 inside a folder and at the bottom of the file browser you’ll have a nice and shiny terminal. You have to remember though - and this can be both useful and dangerous if you’re not careful - that the cli current folder follows you around.
